name: OCEANA
goal: Oceana, founded in 2001, is the largest international organization focused on ocean conservation. Oceana campaigns to protect and restore the worldâ€™s oceans. Our teams of marine scientists, economists, lawyers and advocates win specific and concrete policy changes to reduce pollution and to prevent the irreversible collapse of fish populations, marine mammals and other sea life. Global in scope and dedicated to conservation, Oceana has campaigners based in North America (Washington, DC; Juneau, AK), Europe (Madrid, Spain; Copenhagen, Denmark; Brussels, Belgium), Central America (Mexico, Belize), South America (Brazilia, Brasil and Santiago, Chile) and Asia (Phillipines).
interests: Environment, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Fisheries and marine policies, in particular Common Fisheries Policy, and Nature/Environmental legislation in the marine environment
